project_overview.name: ColorStudy (Huemixy)
project_overview.description: Professional color sampling and analysis application for artists, designers, and creative professionals

agents.name: Mike (project-manager-mike)
agents.purpose: Overseeing and maintaining visibility into all project agents and configurations

agents.name: Huey (todo-ops-manager)
agents.purpose: Managing todos using append-only operations log with snapshots

agents.name: Tommy (tommy-ops-tracker)
agents.purpose: Tracking testing requirements, examination needs, and operational tasks

high_priority.title: Dragging Refactor with Performance Optimizations
high_priority.description: Testing revamped dragging functionality to ensure stability before main branch commit and deployment

implemented_features.name: Artboard System
implemented_features.description: Professional artboards supporting multiple images and unlimited color swatches

implemented_features.name: Color Sampling
implemented_features.description: Precision sampling with configurable sample sizes (1x1 to 31x31 pixels)

implemented_features.name: Multiple Color Modes
implemented_features.description: Support for RGB and CMYK color modes

implemented_features.name: Drag and Drop Interface
implemented_features.description: Swatch dragging functionality with performance optimizations
implemented_features.notes: Currently undergoing testing for stability and performance

deployment.monitoring: PM2 process management with log rotation

key_milestones.details: Mike, Huey, and Tommy agents configured and operational
ops.json system for testing and examination tracking
Append-only JSONL operations with snapshot system

lessons_learned.lesson: Dedicated agents for specific domains (project management, todos, ops tracking) provide clear ownership and responsibility
Systematic testing tracking via ops.json prevents issues from being missed
lessons_learned.impact: Better quality assurance and deployment confidence

lessons_learned.lesson: Append-only operations with snapshots provides both audit trail and performance
lessons_learned.impact: Reliable todo system with full history

immediate_actions.rationale: Critical for core app usability and user experience

short_term_goals.description: Comprehensive testing of all core features under load
Establish process for collecting and acting on user feedback

long_term_strategic_items.description: Evaluate additional color analysis tools and workflow features
Prepare infrastructure and architecture for increased user load

recommended_adjustments.testing: Increase to 30% during drag functionality validation

executive_summary.status: The ColorStudy project is in excellent health with a well-established agent ecosystem and production deployment. Current focus is on completing drag functionality testing before final stability confirmation.
key_achievements: Successful agent specialization with Mike, Huey, and Tommy
Production deployment on huemixy.com with SSL
Comprehensive testing and todo tracking systems
Core color sampling and artboard features fully implemented
executive_summary.critical_focus: Complete drag functionality testing to ensure core app usability meets production standards
executive_summary.next_milestone: Drag functionality validation and performance confirmation
